ThingDef.label: paragon chicken egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: Unfertilized paragon chicken egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked. These eggs are pure, pristine, perfect examples of chicken eggs. Inmaculate eggness.

ThingDef.label: paragon chicken egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: Fertilized paragon chicken egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked. These eggs are pure, pristine, perfect examples of chicken eggs. Inmaculate eggness. If all goes well, it should hatch into a paragon chicken.

ThingDef.label: paragon emu egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: Unfertilized paragon emu egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked. This thing is huge.

ThingDef.label: paragon emu egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: Fertilized paragon emu egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked. This thing is huge. If all goes well, it should hatch into a paragon emu.

ThingDef.label: chickenrabbit egg (unfert.)
